item.title: The Impressive Samsung Impression Phone
item.description:
Get ready to be amazed by a groundbreaking cell phone display technology called AMOLED, short for Active Matrix Organic Light Emitting Diode. This technology delivers a sharper, more vibrant display that is also slimmer, lighter, and more energy-efficient. While it will soon be widely used in various mobile devices, you can currently experience AMOLED technology in the Samsung Impression A877 Blue cell phone. As cell phones continue to replace laptops, the demand for larger screens has increased...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-impressive-samsung-impression-phone/

item.title: Fascinated By The Samsung Fascinate
item.description:
The Samsung Galaxy S series is a highly sought-after line of smartphones, offering a combination of style and advanced technology. The Samsung Fascinate, available through Verizon Wireless, is the newest member of this family. The Fascinate lives up to its name with a vivid 4-inch Super AMOLED display that’s easily viewable indoors and out. Its 1 GHz Hummingbird processor ensures smooth handling of demanding multimedia applications. The phone also boasts a 5-megapixel camera with autofocus and HD video recording capabilities, complemented by a DivX video player and an MP3 music player...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fascinated-by-the-samsung-fascinate/

item.title: The Samsung Epic 4G offers Epic Performance
item.description:
Imagine a smartphone so powerful it surpasses a netbook. Picture yourself declining WiFi because your cellular connection is faster. That’s the kind of speed the Samsung Epic 4G offers with its impressive 10+ Mbps download speeds, thanks to the Sprint WiMAX 4G network. You can even share your connection as a mobile hotspot for your other devices. Beyond speed, the Epic boasts a stunning Super AMOLED touchscreen display with near-HD quality and unmatched contrast...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-samsung-epic-4g-offers-epic-performance/

item.title: Going Rogue But Not Rouge With Samsung
item.description:
If you’re a go-getter in need of a powerful cell phone that won’t let you down, the Samsung Rogue U960 Black for Verizon Wireless is a top contender among smartphones. Does your current phone offer easy access to social media apps like Facebook and MySpace? How about web browsing, YouTube videos, and photo editing on a bright screen, even in sunlight? Can you stream music wirelessly, get directions, or message easily with a physical QWERTY keyboard?..
